title: Special relativity
description: A quiz related to special relativity.

questions.question: Who has originally proposed the special relativity?
questions.note: Special relativity was originally proposed by Albert Einstein in a paper published on 26 September 1905 titled "On the Electrodynamics of Moving Bodies".

questions.question: Is special relativity a synonym of general relativity?
questions.note: Special relativity concentrates on the relativistic motion of a body that is moving with constant motion, while general relativity focuses on the relativistic motion of a body that is accelerating.

questions.question: Who has derived the transformation equations underpinning Albert Einstein's theory of special relativity?
